tool_description: Validates the complete resume format against industry standards, best practices, and technical requirements to ensure professional quality.

validation_scope.description: Validation scope: basic, standard, or comprehensive

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide complete resume content for validation.
Missing specifications: Provide layout, typography, and color specifications.
Invalid industry: Provide valid industry name for appropriate validation.
Invalid validation scope: Use one of [basic, standard, comprehensive].
Unsupported target format: One or more target formats are not supported.
usage: Provide complete resume with all specifications and industry information. Optionally specify validation scope and target formats. Returns comprehensive validation report with quality score.

issues_found.description: List of issues or problems identified

format_compatibility.description: Compatibility assessment for different output formats
